instruction: Describe how technology has changed over the last decade.
output: Over the last decade, technology has experienced vast advancements. Smartphones and tablets have become pervasive, with processing speed, graphical performance, and connectivity quickly surpassing what was thought to be impossible previously. Fully-automated homes are commonplace, allowing users to control various systems such as lighting and heating remotely. In addition, data storage and streaming applications have also improved significantly, enabling users to access information and media more quickly and reliably. Finally, cognitive services such as Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence have become more powerful, efficient, and affordable, allowing businesses and individuals to gain more value from data.
